text:
Hey - getting this message when trying to connect an app
```Couldn't complete the connection
This account doesn't have access to some HubSpot features that are required by this app. Please contact the app developer.```
I’m *ONLY* requesting the `oauth` scope. Any idea what could be causing this? The account I’m trying to link it to is currently a free demo account.
Hey Carlos, sorry I missed your response - you just need to list the properties of the line items that you need e.g. name, price etc
There is a properties endpoint if you want to get a full list for a given account: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties>
Hi everyone :slightly_smiling_face: One question, is it possible to develope an API within HubSpot environment to receive data from an external backend? It's in order to sync contacts

Hello everyone!
Do you know whether is possible or not to extract the property value changes via API.
Is it possible to extract this information via API?

I have read the available documentation but I don't see any endpoint which can perform that action.

Thanks in advance.

From my understanding: No. It is not possible.

You need an integration which takes advantage of the HubSpot API.

If your goal is to test, there should be an issue with the type of account you are using: free demo account.

You better try the test accounts managed by a developer account:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/creating-an-app>
thanks, the API documentation is pretty empty for the import POST operation.  I'll take a look at the client libraries you mentioned and see if I can get details from those.
you can subscribe to property changes via a webhook rather than repeatedly sending a request yourself

Hi Jefferson - thanks for getting back to me. I can install it on the test accounts I’ve created - it’s the Free demo accounts I’m trying to install it on. The reason I’m doing this is because one of the demo accounts is full of test data us devs are using on the project.

Is this just because they’re free demo accounts?
